misc: If not on the course, he is probably billing clients
biography: Lassi, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is set to make his ninth appearance in the upcoming edition of the tournament. Representing Lakeside Golf Vammala, Lassi has become a mainstay in the event, known for his strategic play and calm demeanor under pressure.

While the coveted Hector Trophée has eluded him thus far, Lassi has distinguished himself by capturing the Victor Trophy once, a testament to his individual skill and dedication. His consistent performance and unwavering commitment make him a formidable competitor each year.

Off the course, Lassi practices law. If he is not competing in the Hector Trophée, he is probably billing clients. He brings a unique blend of analytical thinking and competitive spirit to the game, making him a player to watch closely.
